reviewText: I bought this dvd thinking that it would be informative & enlightening, but it was neither. I was half way through the video when I noticed there wasn't much time left for the video to get better. The guy Yahya was walking round in Memphis & Palenstine interviewing people on the street (mainly about religion & polotics). There was nothing in the video about the founding fathers of America, and there was really nothing of value that comes from watching the video. I really wanna support black owned businesses, but Yahya has got to do better than this! This video is VERY mis-leading, & they claim to expose evil on every level of society (all lies by the makers of this video). Learn from my mistake & DON'T SPEND YOUR MONEY on this dvd!!! Instead, if you must see it rent it at the library or video store. I'm throwing my copy away, no need to lend it out & get people dis-interested in The Hebrew Israelite movement. (Yes, it was that bad!)
